modName: Cultist Armor - Light Armor - craftable - upgradeable
summary: Modifies the Cultist Armor in Dragonborn to be craftable and upgradeable, and for all pieces to be of Light Armor at roughly Leather quality
descriptionHtml:
Quick and simple mod that requires the Dragonborn DLC. It\'ll change the existing Cultist armor as per the following -

--Cultist Boots and Robes have been modified from Clothing category to Light Armor

--Cultist Robes have had the standard Magicka regen enchantment removed, allowing an enchantment of the player\'s choice

--Cultist Mask has been modified from Heavy Armor to Light Armor

--Base values, armor ratings, and weights are equivalent to their Leather Armor counterparts

--All can be crafted at a normal forge under the Leather armor category, and improved at a workbench

--All crafting and upgrade material costs are reasonable, requiring only Leather Strips and Leather for most pieces. The Mask also requires a couple Iron Ingots to craft, and 1 Steel Ingot to upgrade.

=== INSTALLATION ===

Download the file, unzip into main Skyrim\\Data folder.

Should conflict only with mods that modify the Dragonborn Cultist Armor. Since this is such a simple mod, I doubt I\'ll modify it in any way. I tested it quickly in-game and found no apparent bugs.
author: isk
